从动物性食品转向植物性食品可降低心脏病、糖尿病和死亡的风险用植物性食品替代动物性食品对心脏代谢健康和全因死亡率的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Switching-from-animal-based-to-plant-based-foods-reduces-risk-of-heart-disease-diabetes-and-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Switching-from-animal-based-to-plant-based-foods-reduces-risk-of-heart-disease-diabetes-and-mortality.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d0a41d9-16de-4b0b-8952-9190e473b446 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 07:56:00 -0500 Switching from animal-based to plant-based foods reduces risk of heart disease, diabetes, and mortality

美国军方表示国家安全取决于“永远的化学品”国防部依赖数百种甚至数千种武器和产品，例如制服、电池和微电子产品，其中含有 PFAS，这是一种与严重健康状况有关的化学物质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/US-military-says-national-security-depends-on-e28098forever-chemicalse28099.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/US-military-says-national-security-depends-on-e28098forever-chemicalse28099.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3884557-2116-47ae-9253-918e3e346bc1 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 06:46:38 -0500 US military says national security depends on ‘forever chemicals’
额外费用推动辅助生活利润对于数十万无法再独立生活的婴儿潮一代来说，辅助生活中心已成为一个有吸引力的退休选择，为疗养院的制度感觉提供了一种令人愉悦的替代选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Extra-fees-drive-assistance-living-profits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Extra-fees-drive-assistance-living-profits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc3278b0-02a0-4511-ab02-7602267e7211 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 06:43:44 -0500 Extra fees drive assisted living profits

MHRA 将两种囊性纤维化药物的许可期限延长至 2 至 5 岁儿童药品和保健品监管局 (MHRA) 今天（2023 年 11 月 15 日）延长了囊性纤维化药物 Kaftrio（ivacaftor、tezacaftor 和 elexacaftor）和 Kalydeco（ivacaftor）用于 2 至 5 岁儿童的许可。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/MHRA-extends-the-license-of-two-cystic-Fiberosis-drugs-for-children-ages-two-to- Five-years-old。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/MHRA-extends-the-license-of-two-cystic-Fiberosis-drugs-for-children-ages-two-to- Five-years-old。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3cb0b4c-ae92-4166-9641-f996ab6927b3 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 05:32:00 -0500 MHRA extends the license of two cystic fibrosis drugs for children aged two to five years old
Tune Therapeutics 推出治疗慢性乙型肝炎病毒感染的潜在治疗方法表观基因组编辑先驱公司 Tune Therapeutics 宣布正在研究一种新的、具有潜在治愈性的方法来治疗慢性乙型肝炎病毒感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Tune-Therapeutics-unveils-pottially-curative-approach-to-treating-chronic-HBV-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Tune-Therapeutics-unveils-pottially-curative-approach-to-treating-chronic-HBV-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebbacdf3-9f18-4a48-a466-f16419b041c4 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 05:27:00 -0500 Tune Therapeutics unveils potentially curative approach to treating chronic HBV infection
